name: Dungeon of Elements (itch)
description:
Dungeon of Elements

This is a game about a mage enters the dungeon to obtain the power of 3 elements. Players have to control the mage to go through each dungeon room, defeat the monsters that try to kill the mage, and collect gems. After clearing all 3 room, players will have to survival the main room and place the gems in the alters.

Credit :
